H0.text: It is still being tested is the best description of a scientific theory.

H1.text: It is true, once written, best describes a scientific theory.

H2.text: It is different for each continent is the best description of a scientific theory according to the question “Which best describes a scientific theory?”

H3.text: It is determined in a court of law is the best description of a scientific theory.

A4.text: Established scientific theories have withstood rigorous scrutiny and embody scientific knowledge.

A5.text: scientific theories may be modified and ultimately rejected if it cannot be made to fit new findings
